name: Arc Digitized Raster Graphic (ADRG)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://earth-info.nga.mil/publications/specs/printed/89007/89007_ADRG.pdf, http://earth-info.nga.mil/publications/specs/printed/89007/89007note1.pdf</field><field name="filenameExtension">thf, cph, gen, qal, ovr, img, sou, lgg</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: ADRG is a standard National Imagery and Mapping Agency (NIMA) digital image product designed to support applications that require a raster map background display.
